definition: to pretend to be (asleep etc)/to disguise oneself as/pretense/disguise/(military) to camouflage/camouflage
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: He could see how his suffering was all the mercy of the Lord coming in disguise.
sentences.chinese: 他能明白他的受苦如何都是伪装而来的主的仁慈。

sentences.english: I have to disguise myself as a swineherd.
sentences.chinese: 我把自己伪装成一个猪倌。

sentences.english: This one masquerades as real, moderate thought.
sentences.chinese: 这一个伪装为真实的，温和的思想。

sentences.english: Inarius took the guise of a human as The Prophet of the Cathedral of Light.
sentences.chinese: 印那瑞斯本人伪装成一个人类，作为光之大教堂先知。

sentences.english: In the guise of a fiction, the truth about himself is articulated.
sentences.chinese: 在虚幻的伪装下，他自我的真相得到了清晰的表达。

sentences.english: E. g. He had a good disguise, but as soon as he spoke he betrayed himself.
sentences.chinese: 他的伪装很好，可是一说话就原形毕露了。

sentences.english: They are the perfect masters of disguise; wearing masks of calm and collected beings.
sentences.chinese: 他们是伪装大师，头戴一副冷静的面具收集信息。

sentences.english: Musette bag with ammo, my webbing, my. 45, canteen…
sentences.chinese: 携物袋加预备弹药，我的伪装网，45手枪，水壶。

sentences.english: The biggest pretenders are the most insecure inside.
sentences.chinese: 最大的伪装者是最不安全的内在。

sentences.english: Why do I waste my time with poseurs and fools ?
sentences.chinese: 我为什么浪费我的与伪装者和傻瓜的时间？
我们甚至还够不上冒充伪装。

sentences.english: Her veneer of politeness began to crack.
sentences.chinese: 她那彬彬有礼的伪装开始露馅儿了。

sentences.english: But you have to admit that it looks awesome. It effectively protects and camouflages the iPad at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 在有效地保护iPad同时还很好地伪装了起来。

sentences.english: British trucks have a small camo detection radius.
sentences.chinese: 英军卡车获得小范围的反伪装能力。

sentences.english: He longed to throw off the mask of respectability.
sentences.chinese: 他渴望丢掉那副道貌岸然的伪装。

sentences.english: The words he said were his unfeigned, honest feelings.
sentences.chinese: 他所说的，是没有任何伪装的最真挚的感情。

definition: to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
to cover up/to conceal/to mask/to gloss over
to hide oneself/invisible (person or online status)
see through (a person, scheme, trick etc)
to cover/to mask/to cover up or conceal (the truth etc)
